title: Dirtbike
desc: I find immense joy in traversing the Colorado Rocky Mountains on my dirtbike, tackling rugged terrain and exploring trails. The thrill of discovering picturesque locations, camping under the stars and the tranquility of natural beauty are what I cherish most.

title: Chickens
desc: I've raised a flock of eight chickens, starting when they were just two weeks old. Over time, they have become beloved pets, enriching my life with their quirky personalities, entertainment, and a steady supply of fresh eggs.

title: Woodwork
desc: Woodworking is a passion of mine, and I've built a small woodshop to pursue it. My expertise in SVG design extends to my work with a CNC machine. Click the boot to explore my woodshop.

title: Growing Food
desc: Growing my own food is a passion rooted in my love for agriculture and self-sufficiency. I strive to cultivate crops from seed whenever possible, reflecting my dedication to farming and sustainable living.

title: Country Music
desc: Country music holds a special place in my heart. There's nothing quite like attending a concert under the stars, where live country music blends with the night sky to create an unforgettable atmosphere.

title: Cooking
desc: I take great pleasure in the full cycle of food productionâ€”growing my own crops, raising chickens for fresh eggs, and using homegrown ingredients to prepare meals. I make as much as possible from scratch, including butter, pasta, mayonnaise, cheese, pizza, sauces, and bread.
